name: Slip Sliding Away (V)
Text: 'Cancel Path Of Least Resistance. (Immune to Sense.) OR During your move phase, target opponent''s character at an interior Cloud City site. Draw destiny. Relocate target to Weather Vane if destiny > target''s ability. OR Relocate your character at an interior Cloud City site to Weather Vane (if ''hit,'' character is first restored to normal).',
